snippet.title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 trailer - PC Gaming Show 2019
snippet.description: Vampire: The Masquerade is finally back, and this first gameplay trailer is your introduction into the seedy underbelly of dreary Seattle. Find out more about Vampire: The Masquerade here: https://www.pcgamer.com/watch-the-vampire-the-masquerade-bloodlines-2-gameplay-reveal/
